mean_cn: n. 项目，工程，课题，方案；  v. 计划，放映，投影，规划，突出
mean_en: a planned piece of work that has a specific purpose (such as to find information or to make something new) and that usually requires a lot of time
word_etyma: pro向前，在前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射，引申为工程项目，计划
sentence: The engineers are discussing the construction project.
sentence_trans: 工程师们正在讨论这个建筑工程。
